* An Exception thrown for trying to mark a marked Task.
* @param task The task which user tried to mark again.

+ "But SUMO will mark it as done again!\n" + task);
* An Exception thrown for trying to unmark a unmarked Task.
* @param task The task which user tried to mark again.
super("Sumo confused. This task is not completed in the first place!\n"
+ "But SUMO will mark it as NOT done again!\n" + task);
* Thrown when user input an event where start time is after end time

* @param command The command which user tried to perform.

* In charge of parsing jobs in SumoDE.

"dd MMM yyyy", "dd MMMM yyyy", "MMM dd, yyyy", "MMMM dd, yyyy",

// Additional patterns with yy for two-digit year format after MM or dd

<HBox fx:id="heading" alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="30" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0">
Task test = Task.of(Command.DEADLINE, "parktour with my hand /by 2024-08-06");
assertEquals("D | 0 | parktour with my hand | Aug 6 2024", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[D][ ]parktour with my hand (by: Aug 6 2024)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.of(Command.DEADLINE, "parktour with my hand /by now");
assertEquals("D | 0 | parktour with my hand | now", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[D][ ]parktour with my hand (by: now)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("D | 0 | parktour with my hand | 2024-08-06");
assertEquals("D | 0 | parktour with my hand | Aug 6 2024", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[D][ ]parktour with my hand (by: Aug 6 2024)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("D | 1 | parktour with myself | now");
assertEquals("D | 1 | parktour with myself | now", test.savedString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("D | 0  parktour with myself  now | morrow");
Task test = Task.of(Command.EVENT, "parktour with my hand /from 2024-08-06 /to 2024-08-07");
assertEquals("E | 0 | parktour with my hand | Aug 6 2024 | Aug 7 2024", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[E][ ]parktour with my hand (from: Aug 6 2024 to: Aug 7 2024)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.of(Command.EVENT, "parktour with my hand /to 2024-08-07 /from 2024-08-06");
assertEquals("E | 0 | parktour with my hand | Aug 6 2024 | Aug 7 2024", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[E][ ]parktour with my hand (from: Aug 6 2024 to: Aug 7 2024)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.of(Command.EVENT, "parktour with myself /to morrow /from now");
assertEquals("E | 0 | parktour with myself | now | morrow", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[E][ ]parktour with myself (from: now to: morrow)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("E | 0 | parktour with my hand | 2024-08-06 | 2024-08-07");
assertEquals("E | 0 | parktour with my hand | Aug 6 2024 | Aug 7 2024", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[E][ ]parktour with my hand (from: Aug 6 2024 to: Aug 7 2024)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("E | 0 | parktour with myself | now | morrow");
assertEquals("E | 0 | parktour with myself | now | morrow", test.savedString());
assertEquals("[E][ ]parktour with myself (from: now to: morrow)", test.toString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("E | 0  parktour with myself | now | morrow");
Task test = Task.of(Command.TODO, "parktour with my hand");
assertEquals("T | 1 | parktour with my hand", test.savedString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Task test = Task.createFromData("T | 0 | parktour with my hand 2024-08-06");
assertEquals("T | 0 | parktour with my hand 2024-08-06", test.savedString());
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Sumo confused. This task is not completed in the first place!
But SUMO will mark it as NOT done again!
Task test = Task.createFromData("T | 0 | parktour with my hand 2024-08-06");
Task test = Task.createFromData("T | 1 | parktour with my hand 2024-08-06");
Sumo confused. This task is marked as done in the first place!
But SUMO will mark it as done again!
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
fail("Exception is thrown when is it not supposed to be. Exception message below\n"
Sumo understood your command but dunno what you want! Please utilise "event" the correct way.
The correct syntax is event <task name> /from <date> /to <date>.""",
event watch CS2103T lecture /from now /to tomorrow
